channel.title: JBoss Issue Tracker
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [ENTESB-2692] fuse-bxms-integ SY module error
item.description:
When deploying bpm-service into an EAP 6.4 container with the fuse-bxms-integ SwitchYard bits, I'm seeing the following error:

10:13:23,638 INFO [org.jboss.weld.deployer] (MSC service thread 1-5) JBAS016002: Processing weld deployment switchyard-demo-library.jar
10:13:23,655 INFO [org.jboss.weld.deployer] (MSC service thread 1-5) JBAS016005: Starting Services for CDI deployment: switchyard-demo-library.jar
10:13:23,659 INFO [org.switchyard] (MSC service thread 1-5) Deploying SwitchYard application 'switchyard-demo-library.jar'
10:13:23,661 INFO [org.jboss.weld.deployer] (MSC service thread 1-5) JBAS016008: Starting weld service for deployment switchyard-demo-library.jar
10:13:23,700 WARN [org.jboss.modules] (MSC service thread 1-5) Failed to define class org.switchyard.component.common.knowledge.deploy.OSGiKnowledgeBundleActivator in Module "org.switchyard.component.common.knowledge:main" from local module loader @28fe2250 (finder: local module finder @447ec736 (roots: /Users/cunningt/jboss-eap-6.4/modules,/Users/cunningt/jboss-eap-6.4/modules/system/layers/soa,/Users/cunningt/jboss-eap-6.4/modules/system/layers/bpms,/Users/cunningt/jboss-eap-6.4/modules/system/layers/base)): java.lang.LinkageError: Failed to link org/switchyard/component/common/knowledge/deploy/OSGiKnowledgeBundleActivator (Module "org.switchyard.component.common.knowledge:main" from local module loader @28fe2250 (finder: local module finder @447ec736 (roots: /Users/cunningt/jboss-eap-6.4/modules,/Users/cunningt/jboss-eap-6.4/modules/system/layers/soa,/Users/cunningt/jboss-eap-6.4/modules/system/layers/bpms,/Users/cunningt/jboss-eap-6.4/modules/system/layers/base)))

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
